    • flat

      @NotNull <T> @NotNull Stream<T> flat(@NotNull @NotNull Hope<T> hope)
      Flat an Hope instance, adding error if present. To be used with Stream.flatMap(Function)
      Type Parameters:
      T - Hope type
      Parameters:
      hope - Hope instance.
      Returns:
      empty stream on error, singleton stream when no error

    • flat

      Parameters:
